question: Which among the following is a correct definition of Aggradation?
option1: Floodplain Deposits can raise the elevation of the stream bed
option2: Channel deposits can raise the elevation at the banks of stream
option3: growth of a river delta farther out into the sea over time
option4: landward change in position of the front of a river delta with time
answer: Floodplain Deposits can raise the elevation of the stream bed
